javax.validation.spi

接口 BootstrapState


  • public interface BootstrapState
    Defines the state used to bootstrap the Configuration.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ValidationProviderResolver getDefaultValidationProviderResolver()
      Specification default ValidationProviderResolver strategy instance.
      ValidationProviderResolver getValidationProviderResolver()
      User defined ValidationProviderResolver strategy instance or null if undefined.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getValidationProviderResolver

        ValidationProviderResolver getValidationProviderResolver()
        User defined ValidationProviderResolver strategy instance or null if undefined.
        返回:
        ValidationProviderResolver instance or null

      • getDefaultValidationProviderResolver

        ValidationProviderResolver getDefaultValidationProviderResolver()
        Specification default ValidationProviderResolver strategy instance.
        返回:
        default implementation of ValidationProviderResolver
